name: Lights in the Sky (grayghost)
description:
Lights in the Sky is a short exploration horror/sci-fi game made in one week about investigating the disappearence of a team of scientists and finishing their work, with beautiful music and retro visuals. Also, aliens!
The game is about 10-20 minutes long.
Currently version 2 as I had to make some bug fixes!

This was made following along with the 7-Day Game Launch tutorial from Game Dev Unlocked :) It's my first ever game, and I'm very proud of it! Critiques and advice are absolutely welcome, but please be gentle!
